description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Astro Taxi 2 introduces the feature you could not even imagine in your wildest dreams: Multiplayer!!! Play the new duel mode and beat your friends or play the party mode with up to 8 Players and be the king of your Astro Taxi party.
description.short: Astro Taxi 2 introduces the feature you could not even imagine in your wildest dreams: Multiplayer!!! Play the new duel mode and beat your friends or play the party mode with up to 8 Players and be the king of your Astro Taxi party.
